mapper.select: SELECT s.shoe_seq, s.category_seq, c.category, s.shoe, s.shoe_price, s.shoe_img, s.parent_category_seq, s.parent_category_seq_name, IFNULL(COUNT(r.review_seq), 0) AS reviewCount, IFNULL(AVG(CAST(r.review_rating AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS averageRating FROM SHOES s LEFT JOIN REVIEWS r ON s.shoe_seq = r.shoe_seq LEFT JOIN CATEGORIES c ON s.category_seq = c.category_seq GROUP BY s.shoe_seq HAVING parent_category_seq_name = #{parent_category_seq_name};

SELECT s.shoe_seq, s.category_seq, c.category, s.shoe, s.shoe_price, s.shoe_img, s.parent_category_seq, s.parent_category_seq_name, IFNULL(COUNT(r.review_seq), 0) AS reviewCount, IFNULL(AVG(CAST(r.review_rating AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS averageRating FROM SHOES s LEFT JOIN REVIEWS r ON s.shoe_seq = r.shoe_seq LEFT JOIN CATEGORIES c ON s.category_seq = c.category_seq WHERE s.parent_category_seq_name = #{parent_category_seq_name} GROUP BY s.shoe_seq HAVING reviewCount >= 40 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10;

SELECT s.shoe_seq, s.category_seq, c.category, s.shoe, s.shoe_price, s.shoe_img, s.parent_category_seq, s.parent_category_seq_name, IFNULL(COUNT(r.review_seq), 0) AS reviewCount, IFNULL(AVG(CAST(r.review_rating AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS averageRating FROM SHOES s LEFT JOIN REVIEWS r ON s.shoe_seq = r.shoe_seq LEFT JOIN CATEGORIES c ON s.category_seq = c.category_seq GROUP BY s.shoe_seq;

SELECT s.shoe_seq, s.category_seq, c.category, s.shoe, s.shoe_price, s.shoe_img, s.parent_category_seq, s.parent_category_seq_name, IFNULL(COUNT(r.review_seq), 0) AS reviewCount, IFNULL(AVG(CAST(r.review_rating AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS averageRating FROM SHOES s LEFT JOIN REVIEWS r ON s.shoe_seq = r.shoe_seq LEFT JOIN CATEGORIES c ON s.category_seq = c.category_seq WHERE s.category_seq = #{category_seq} GROUP BY s.shoe_seq;

SELECT s.shoe_seq, s.category_seq, s.shoe, s.shoe_price, s.shoe_img, s.parent_category_seq, s.parent_category_seq_name, IFNULL(COUNT(r.review_seq), 0) AS reviewCount, IFNULL(AVG(CAST(r.review_rating AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS averageRating FROM SHOES s LEFT JOIN REVIEWS r ON s.shoe_seq = r.shoe_seq
WHERE s.shoe_seq = #{shoe_seq} GROUP BY s.shoe_seq;
